[P] A command-line tool that spins-up EC2 instances of any CPU or GPU specification, configures your laptop so you can connect to secure EC2 remotely using VS-Code Remote-SSH and start writing machine-learning algorithms using VS-Code's interactive Python. https://www.reddit.com/r/MachineLearning/comments/ctpcwi/p_a_commandline_tool_that_spinsup_ec2_instances/
r/MachineLearning - [P] A command-line tool that spins-up EC2 instances of any CPU or GPU specification, configures your laptop so you can connect to secure EC2 remotely using VS-Code Remote-SSH and start writing machine-learning algorithms using VS-Code's interactive Python.
